statements.statement: select biId--, lastDelivered.biIk, PsyGroup.actPsyGroup, biDataYear from ( -- last delivered psyGroup select lastAeb.biIk, ehPsyGroup as actPsyGroup from ( select biId, biIk, biDataYear as lastDataYear, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc) as rown from psy.AEBBaseInformation where biStatusId = 10 ) lastAeb join psy.ExpectedHospital eh on eh.ehIk = lastAeb.biIk and eh.ehYear = lastAeb.lastDataYear where rown = 1 ) PsyGroup join ( -- last delivered data select biId, biIk, biDataYear, biStatusId from ( select biId, biIk, biDataYear, biStatusId, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc, biTyp) as rown from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi --on bi.biIk = actPsyGroup.biIk left join ( select hccAebBaseInformationId1, hccAebBaseInformationId2 from psy.mapHospitalComparisonConflict join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi1 on bi1.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId1 and bi1.biStatusId = 10 join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi2 on bi2.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId2 and bi2.biStatusId = 10 ) conflict on conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId1 = bi.biId or conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId2 = bi.biId join psy.ExpectedHospital eh on eh.ehIk = bi.biIk and eh.ehYear = bi.biDataYear join CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu on cu.cuIK = ehIk where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) and bi.biDataYear = {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10 and hccAebBaseInformationId1 is null ) data where rown = 1 ) lastDelivered on lastDelivered.biIk = PsyGroup.biIk where PsyGroup.actPsyGroup = {psyGroupId}

select biId--, lastDelivered.biIk, PsyGroup.actPsyGroup, biDataYear from ( -- last delivered psyGroup select lastAeb.biIk, ehPsyGroup as actPsyGroup from ( select biId, biIk, biDataYear as lastDataYear, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc) as rown from psy.AEBBaseInformation where biStatusId = 10 ) lastAeb join psy.ExpectedHospital eh on eh.ehIk = lastAeb.biIk and eh.ehYear = lastAeb.lastDataYear where rown = 1 ) PsyGroup join ( -- last delivered data select biId, biIk, biDataYear, biStatusId from ( select biId, biIk, biDataYear, biStatusId, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc, biTyp) as rown from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi --on bi.biIk = actPsyGroup.biIk left join ( select hccAebBaseInformationId1, hccAebBaseInformationId2 from psy.mapHospitalComparisonConflict join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi1 on bi1.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId1 and bi1.biStatusId = 10 join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi2 on bi2.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId2 and bi2.biStatusId = 10 ) conflict on conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId1 = bi.biId or conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId2 = bi.biId join psy.ExpectedHospital eh on eh.ehIk = bi.biIk and eh.ehYear = bi.biDataYear join CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu on cu.cuIK = ehIk where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) and bi.biDataYear between {year} - 1 and {year} and bi.biDataYear = {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10 and hccAebBaseInformationId1 is null ) data where rown = 1 ) lastDelivered on lastDelivered.biIk = PsyGroup.biIk where PsyGroup.actPsyGroup = {psyGroupId}

select biId from ( select biId, biDataYear, row_number() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc, biTyp) prio from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi left join ( select hccAebBaseInformationId1, hccAebBaseInformationId2 from psy.mapHospitalComparisonConflict join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi1 on bi1.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId1 and bi1.biStatusId = 10 join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi2 on bi2.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId2 and bi2.biStatusId = 10 ) conflict on conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId1 = bi.biId or conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId2 = bi.biId where bi.biIk in ( select cu.cuik from CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) ) and bi.biDataYear = {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10 and conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId1 is null ) a where prio = 1

select biId from ( select biId, biDataYear, row_number() over (partition by biIk order by biDataYear desc, biTyp) prio from psy.AEBBaseInformation bi left join ( select hccAebBaseInformationId1, hccAebBaseInformationId2 from psy.mapHospitalComparisonConflict join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi1 on bi1.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId1 and bi1.biStatusId = 10 join psy.AEBBaseInformation bi2 on bi2.biId = hccAebBaseInformationId2 and bi2.biStatusId = 10 ) conflict on conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId1 = bi.biId or conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId2 = bi.biId where bi.biIk in ( select cu.cuik from CallCenterDB.dbo.ccCustomer cu where cuIsTest = 0 and cuIsActive = 1 and cuik not in (select hcexIk from psy.HospitalComparisonExcludeIK) and case when cu.cuPsyStateId = 255 then cu.cuStateId else cu.cuPsyStateId end in ({stateIds}) ) and bi.biDataYear between {year} - 1 and {year} and bi.biStatusId = 10 and conflict.hccAebBaseInformationId1 is null ) a where prio = 1
